tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Parses VCF or BCF and produces stats which can be plotted using plot-vcfstats
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section ${sec_default.1st_allele_only} --collapse "${sec_default.collapse}" --depth "${sec_default.depth}" --exons "${sec_default.exons}" #set values_sec_default_apply_filters = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.apply_filters_repeat]) --apply-filters "${values_sec_default_apply_filters}" --fasta-ref "${sec_default.fasta_ref}" ${sec_default.split_by_ID} #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #set values_sec_default_samples = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.samples_repeat]) --samples "${values_sec_default_samples}" --samples-file "${sec_default.samples_file}" #set values_sec_default_targets = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.targets_repeat]) --targets "${values_sec_default_targets}" --targets-file "${sec_default.targets_file}" --user-tstv "${sec_default.user_tstv}" ${sec_default.verbose}

param.help: include only 1st allele at multiallelic sites
param.label: 1St Allele Only
param.name: 1st_allele_only

param.help: treat as identical records with <snps|indels|both|all|some|none>, see man page for details [none]
param.label: Collapse
param.name: collapse

param.help: tab-delimited file with exons for indel frameshifts (chr,from,to; 1-based, inclusive, bgzip compressed)
param.label: Exons
param.name: exons

param.help: require at least one of the listed FILTER strings (e.g. "PASS,.")
param.label: Apply Filters
param.name: apply_filters

param.help: faidx indexed reference sequence file to determine INDEL context
param.label: Fasta Ref
param.name: fasta_ref

param.help: collect stats for sites with ID separately (known vs novel)
param.label: Split By Id
param.name: split_by_ID

param.help: restrict to comma-separated list of regions
param.label: Regions
param.name: regions

param.help: restrict to regions listed in a file
param.label: Regions File
param.name: regions_file

param.help: list of samples for sample stats, "-" to include all samples
param.label: Samples
param.name: samples

param.help: similar to -r but streams rather than index-jumps
param.label: Targets
param.name: targets

param.help: similar to -R but streams rather than index-jumps
param.label: Targets File
param.name: targets_file

param.help: collect Ts/Tv stats for any tag using the given binning [0:1:100]
param.label: User Tstv
param.name: user_tstv

param.help: produce verbose per-site and per-sample output
param.label: Verbose
param.name: verbose

tool.help: Parses VCF or BCF and produces stats which can be plotted using plot-vcfstats. When two files are given, the program generates separate stats for intersection and the complements. By default only sites are compared, -s/-S must given to include also sample columns.
